meanings.definition: A class of chemical compounds that includes riboflavin and related molecules.
meanings.sent1: Isoalloxazines are important for the body's energy production.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying isoalloxazines to understand their role in metabolism.
meanings.sent3: The isoalloxazines at the party were the life of the chemical reaction!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity sparkled like isoalloxazines in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of isoalloxazines make them easy to identify in a lab experiment.
